19  
20  import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
21  import java.util.Map;
22  
23  /**
24   * Simple LRU cache implementation that uses a LinkedHashMap.
25   * This cache is not synchronized, use {@link Cache#synchronizedCache(Cache)}
26   * if needed.
27   * 
28   */
29  public class SimpleLRUCache extends SimpleMapCache {
30    private final static float LOADFACTOR = 0.75f;
31  
32    private int cacheSize;
33  
34    /**
35     * Creates a last-recently-used cache with the specified size. 
36     */
37    public SimpleLRUCache(int cacheSize) {
38      super(null);
39      this.cacheSize = cacheSize;
40      int capacity = (int) Math.ceil(cacheSize / LOADFACTOR) + 1;
41  
42      super.map = new LinkedHashMap(capacity, LOADFACTOR, true) {
43        protected boolean removeEldestEntry(Map.Entry eldest) {
44          return size() > SimpleLRUCache.this.cacheSize;
45        }
46      };
47    }
48  
49  }
50
  SimpleLRUCache.java
